CustomField.description: Returns the current Stage of the related Engagement, Opportunity or Opportunity Outcome record.
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Engagement_Relationship" , TEXT( Engagement__r.Stage_Name__c ) , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Opportunity_Relationship" , TEXT( Opportunity__r.StageName ) , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Opportunity_Outcome_Relationship" , TEXT( Opportunity_Outcome__r.Stage_Name__c ), "" )))
CustomField.label: Stage
